overview: "In my opinion, Rein is the most significant poet of our generation, that is, the generation to which I belong...," Nobel laureate Joseph Brodsky wrote about his friend. Our film is a kind of monologue of the poet "about time and about myself". There was a place in it for the famous tales of the Rhine, and his memories of Anna Akhmatova and Joseph Brodsky, and details of his past and present life, and, of course, his poems that have already become textbook and completely new…
title: The Banks of Rhine
